columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the storage account.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a storage account uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: access_tier
columns.description: The access tier used for billing.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The kind of the resource.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Contains sku name of the storage account.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Contains sku tier of the storage account.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: Creation date and time of the storage account.

columns.name: allow_blob_public_access
columns.description: Specifies whether allow or disallow public access to all blobs or containers in the storage account.

columns.name: blob_change_feed_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether change feed event logging is enabled for the Blob service.

columns.name: blob_container_soft_delete_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether DeleteRetentionPolicy is enabled.

columns.name: blob_container_soft_delete_retention_days
columns.description: Indicates the number of days that the deleted item should be retained.

columns.name: blob_restore_policy_days
columns.description: Specifies how long the blob can be restored.

columns.name: blob_restore_policy_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether blob restore is enabled.

columns.name: blob_service_logging
columns.description: Specifies the blob service properties for logging access.

columns.name: blob_soft_delete_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether DeleteRetentionPolicy is enabled.

columns.name: blob_soft_delete_retention_days
columns.description: Indicates the number of days that the deleted item should be retained.

columns.name: blob_versioning_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether versioning is enabled.

columns.name: enable_https_traffic_only
columns.description: Allows https traffic only to storage service if sets to true.

columns.name: encryption_key_source
columns.description: Contains the encryption keySource (provider).

columns.name: encryption_key_vault_properties_key_current_version_id
columns.description: The object identifier of the current versioned Key Vault Key in use.

columns.name: encryption_key_vault_properties_key_name
columns.description: The name of KeyVault key.

columns.name: encryption_key_vault_properties_key_vault_uri
columns.description: The Uri of KeyVault.

columns.name: encryption_key_vault_properties_key_version
columns.description: The version of KeyVault key.

columns.name: encryption_key_vault_properties_last_rotation_time
columns.description: Timestamp of last rotation of the Key Vault Key.

columns.name: failover_in_progress
columns.description: Specifies whether the failover is in progress.

columns.name: file_soft_delete_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether DeleteRetentionPolicy is enabled.

columns.name: file_soft_delete_retention_days
columns.description: Indicates the number of days that the deleted item should be retained.

columns.name: is_hns_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether account HierarchicalNamespace is enabled.

columns.name: queue_logging_delete
columns.description: Specifies whether all delete requests should be logged.

columns.name: queue_logging_read
columns.description: Specifies whether all read requests should be logged.

columns.name: queue_logging_retention_days
columns.description: Indicates the number of days that metrics or logging data should be retained.

columns.name: queue_logging_retention_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether a retention policy is enabled for the storage service.

columns.name: queue_logging_version
columns.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

columns.name: queue_logging_write
columns.description: Specifies whether all write requests should be logged.

columns.name: table_logging_read
columns.description: Indicates whether all read requests should be logged.

columns.name: table_logging_write
columns.description: Indicates whether all write requests should be logged.

columns.name: table_logging_delete
columns.description: Indicates whether all delete requests should be logged.

columns.name: table_logging_version
columns.description: The version of Analytics to configure.

columns.name: table_logging_retention_policy
columns.description: The retention policy.

columns.name: minimum_tls_version
columns.description: Contains the minimum TLS version to be permitted on requests to storage.

columns.name: network_rule_bypass
columns.description: Specifies whether traffic is bypassed for Logging/Metrics/AzureServices.

columns.name: network_rule_default_action
columns.description: Specifies the default action of allow or deny when no other rules match.

columns.name: primary_blob_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the blob endpoint.

columns.name: primary_dfs_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the dfs endpoint.

columns.name: primary_file_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the file endpoint.

columns.name: primary_location
columns.description: Contains the location of the primary data center for the storage account.

columns.name: primary_queue_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the queue endpoint.

columns.name: primary_table_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the table endpoint.

columns.name: primary_web_endpoint
columns.description: Contains the web endpoint.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Allow or disallow public network access to Storage Account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be Enabled or Disabled.

columns.name: status_of_primary
columns.description: The status indicating whether the primary location of the storage account is available or unavailable. Possible values include: 'available', 'unavailable'.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the storage account resource.

columns.name: require_infrastructure_encryption
columns.description: Specifies whether or not the service applies a secondary layer of encryption with platform managed keys for data at rest.

columns.name: secondary_location
columns.description: Contains the location of the geo-replicated secondary for the storage account.

columns.name: status_of_secondary
columns.description: The status indicating whether the secondary location of the storage account is available or unavailable. Only available if the SKU name is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS. Possible values include: 'available', 'unavailable'.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the storage account.

columns.name: encryption_scope
columns.description: Encryption scope details for the storage account.

columns.name: encryption_services
columns.description: A list of services which support encryption.

columns.name: lifecycle_management_policy
columns.description: The managementpolicy associated with the specified storage account.

columns.name: network_ip_rules
columns.description: A list of IP ACL rules.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of private endpoint connection associated with the specified storage account.

columns.name: table_properties
columns.description: Azure Analytics Logging settings of tables.

columns.name: access_keys
columns.description: The list of access keys or Kerberos keys (if active directory enabled) for the specified storage account.

columns.name: virtual_network_rules
columns.description: A list of virtual network rules.

columns.name: sas_policy
columns.description: A list of virtual network rules.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
